programme.title: 24 Hafta Sonu
programme.desc: Yaşamın tum gerçekleri, hayatın her alanına değen konularla merak edilen her şey Deniz Uğur ile "24 Hafta Sonu"nda ekrana geliyor.

programme.title: Doğrusu Ne?
programme.desc: Turkiye ve dunya gundemindeki en sıcak başlıklar "Doğrusu Ne?" programında ele alınıyor. Satır aralarında saklı kalmış gerçekler, gundemin temposunda gozden kaçan ayrıntılar masaya yatırılıyor.

programme.title: 24 Portre
programme.desc: Zeynep Turkoğlu; kultur, siyaset, sanat dunyasından gunumuze damgasını vuran seçkin isimleri 24 TVye konuk ediyor. Zeynep Turkoğlu ile 24 Portre her hafta Pazar gunu saat 20.00de 24 TVde.

programme.title: An Ve Zaman
programme.desc: Tarih 24 ekranlarında yeniden yazılıyor. Tarihin arka odalarında kalan onemli olayların ayrıntıları Özgenur Reyhan Gulerin moderatorluğunde "An ve Zaman"da tartışılıyor.

programme.title: 8. Etap
programme.desc: Ekranların en uzun soluklu otomobil ve motor sporları programı "8. Etap" otomobil dunyasındaki yenilikleri ve son haberleri ekrana yansıtıyor.

programme.title: Kahve Molası
programme.desc: Piyasalar gune ara verdiğinde, hem iş dunyasından hem de yaşamın içinden konuklarla hayata dokunan gelişmelerin ekonomik boyutu "Kahve Molası"nda masaya yatırılıyor.

programme.title: 8. Etap

programme.title: Aileler Yarışıyor
programme.desc: Gunluk hayattan çok basit soruların sokaktaki 100 kişiye sorulması sonucu alınan en populer cevapları bulmaya çalışan yarışmacılar, final etabında buyuk odulu kazanmak için yarışıyorlar.

programme.title: Almanya Acı Vatan
programme.desc: Almanyadan koyune iznini geçirmek uzere gelen Guldane, Mahmut ile tanışır. Almanya duşleriyle yaşayan Mahmut, para ve arazi karşılığında Guldaneye evlenme teklifi eder. Mahmutun amacı boyle bir formalite evlilik sayesinde Almanyaya gidip yerleşmektir. Evlenip birlikte Almanyaya giderler. Para biriktirmekten başka bir şey duşunmeyen Guldane, Almanyaya vardıklarında Mahmutu terk eder. Mahmut tek başına yabancı bir ulkede kalırken, Guldane çalıştığı fabrikanın disiplinine ve otomasyonuna kendini kaptırarak, hissizleşir. Alman polisi aylak aylak dolaşan Mahmutu yakalayıp karısına teslim eder. Ama sonunda kendisini uzun bir sureden beri rahatsız eden bir Turk’ten kurtulmak için Mahmuta yaklaşmak zorunda kalır.

programme.title: Ataman ile Devr-i Alem
programme.desc: Parisin Eyfeli, İtalyanın Pissa Kulesi, Venedikin gondolları... Farklı bir soluk, farklı bir macera Ataman Erkulun gozunden dunya turuna ne dersiniz? Eğer siz de keyifli bir dunya turuna çıkmak isterseniz, Ataman ile Devri Alem 360ta...

programme.title: Baş Belası
programme.desc: Mafya içinde tek kurşun lakabıyla un yapmış bir besteciyle sevdiği kız için surekli intihar girişiminde bulunan bir adamın oykusu anlatılıyor. Rastlantı sonucu iki adamın yolları kesişir. Bir sure sonra saf aşık, kabadayının baş belası haline gelir.

programme.title: Oyun Bitti
programme.desc: Zeynep bir barda şarkıcılık yapmaktadır. Onu izleyen bir fabrikator kuruluş gecesi partisinde şarkı soylemesini ister. Geceye katılan Zeynep asansorde Doğan isimli bir gençle tanışır. Aslında araba tamircisi olan Doğan, Zeynep’i evin kızı sanır ve kendisini muhendis olarak tanıtır. Zeynep de oyunu surdurur ve boylece Doğan ve Zeynep’in ilişkileri ilerler. Daha sonra yanlış anlaşılmalar yuzunden ayrı duşen iki aşık yıllar sonra yeniden bir araya geleceklerdir.

programme.title: Kul Kedisi
programme.desc: Babası olen Sinderella için yapılacak tek şey, uvey annesinin ve onun kızlarının emirlerine boyun eğmek ve dediklerini yapmaktadır. O sıralarda Sinderella’nın yaşadığı ulkenin prensi ruyasında bir kız gorur ve ona aşık olur.

programme.title: Seksenler
programme.desc: Klasik bir Turk ailesinin yaşamını konu alan eğlenceli bir donem sit-comu... Sosyal hayattaki değişim, hayatımıza giren yeniliklerin bizleri nasıl etkilediği gozler onune seriliyor. Seksenler dizisi bize kaybettiğimiz insani değerleri yeni nesillere tekrar kazandırmak amacıyla geçmişe yapılmış eğlenceli bir yolculuk... Çocuklar; sobayı, merdaneli makineyi, pul yapıştırıp yolladığımız mektupları, anket defterlerini, siyah onlukleri, kolalı yakaları, sokaklarda koşturarak surduğumuz telli arabaları ve misket dolu torbaları ilk defa bu dizide goruyor.

programme.title: Ataman ile Devr-i Alem
programme.desc: Parisin Eyfeli, İtalyanın Pissa Kulesi, Venedikin gondolları... Farklı bir soluk, farklı bir macera Ataman Erkulun gozunden dunya turuna ne dersiniz? Eğer siz de keyifli bir dunya turuna çıkmak isterseniz, Ataman ile Devri Alem 360ta...

programme.title: Fosforlu Cevriyem
programme.desc: Üvey anneleri yuzunden babalarıyla ilişkileri bozulan ve sarhoş olduğu bir gece kardeşlerden birinin babasını oldurmesiyle başlayan kaçışın oykusu...

programme.title: Lezzet Peşinde
programme.desc: Lezzet Peşinde, muhteşem tatların ve lezzet sırlarının yanı sıra, işin ustalarının hayat hikayeleri ve başarı seruvenleriyle ekrana geliyor.

programme.title: Kul Kedisi
programme.desc: Babası olen Sinderella için yapılacak tek şey, uvey annesinin ve onun kızlarının emirlerine boyun eğmek ve dediklerini yapmaktadır. O sıralarda Sinderella’nın yaşadığı ulkenin prensi ruyasında bir kız gorur ve ona aşık olur.

programme.title: Ben Bilirim
programme.desc: Studyodaki yarışmacılar ve ekran başındaki seyirciler farklı kategorilerle ilgili soruları yanıtlamaya çalışıyor. Siz de Ben Bilirim diyorsanız, bu yarışma size gore...

programme.title: Savunma
programme.desc: Kendisinden kuçuk olan Cengiz ile evli Çiğdem, zengin bir iş kadınıdır. Evliliği kotu gidiyordur, Cengiz onu aldatmıştır ve evine gelen tehdit telefonları ve mektuplarla depresyona girmiştir. Çiğdemin ayrılma isteğini kabul etmeyen Cengiz, iş için Ankaraya gider ve genç kadın oldurulur.

programme.title: Sağlık Olsun
programme.desc: Alanında uzman doktorlar, her bolum farklı bir sağlık konusu ile daha bilinçli ve daha sağlıklı olmanın tum ipuçlarını anlatıyorlar.A’dan Z’ye sağlıklı yaşama dair merak edilen tum sorular bu programda cevap buluyor.

programme.title: Turk Sineması
programme.desc: Aşkları, huzunleri, sevinçleri ve tum sıcaklığıyla bizlerin hikayeleri; sinemamızda iz bırakmış ornekleriyle geçmişten gunumuze Turk sinemasının sevilen tum filmleri 360 ekranlarında...

programme.title: Gokyuzunden
programme.desc: Turkiyeye hiç bu gozden bakmadınız. Anadolunun eşsiz guzellikleri, doğa manzaraları, tarihi kentleri ve çok daha fazlası drone ile çekildi. Ortaya harika bir belgesel çıktı. Cennet vatanı bir de Gokyuzunden izlemek isteyenler ekran başına...

programme.title: Ekmekçi Kadın
programme.desc: Osman ve Fatma, çocukları Murat ve Gul’le çok mutludurlar. Fakat Gul evden ayrı yetişmektedir. Osman talihsiz bir kaza sonucu yaşamını yitirince, Fatma yalnız kalır. Guzelliği, bu durumdaki çoğu kadın gibi, başına dert olacaktır.

programme.title: Kuşçu
programme.desc: Hayatını kuş kafesi yaparak geçiren bir adam, gunun birinde ailesini yitirir. Ailesinden geriye sadece kuçuk oğlu kalan adam, bu olaydan sonra insanlardan kaçacak ve kendini alkole verecektir.Ailesinden hatıra kalan biricik oğlu ile kuşlar, bu yalnız adamın, kotu hayatı karşısında tek tesellisi olacaktır.

programme.title: Satır Arası
programme.desc: Haber, ayrıntıda gizlidir. Cevaplar kadar sorular da onemlidir. Olayların gorunen ve gorunmeyen yonlerini yakalamak, gundemin perde arkasını oğrenmek için birlikteyiz. Satır Arası, gerçeği soylemek, geçmişten bugune ne olup bittiğini anlatmak için izleyicilerle buluşuyor.

programme.title: Avrupadan Futbol
programme.desc: Avrupadan Futbolda, Avrupa liglerinde oynanan maçlardan goruntuler, takımların son durumları ve oyuncuların performansları değerlendiriliyor.

programme.title: Hercai
programme.desc: Midyat’a İstanbullu bir iş adamı olarak gelen Miran Aslanbey, Nasuh Şadoğlu’na ortaklıktan fazlasını teklif eder. Ardından torunu Reyyan’ı da ister. Ancak yorenin en guçlu aile reisi Nasuh’un çok iyi bir kısmet dediği Miran için farklı planları vardır. Ona bir torun verecektir ama istediği torunu değil... Nasuh, Miran’ı kendi planına ikna etmeye çalışırken, Miran’ın planlarından habersizdir. İki erkek arasında verilecek karar merakla beklenirken, gelen haber Reyyan ve Yaren’in hayatını derinden etkiler.Midyat’ın binlerce yıllık geçmişinin izleri uzerinde yeşeren bir aşk hikayesi, iki ailenin kaderini nasıl etkileyecek? İstanbullu yakışıklı iş adamı ile Midyat’ın guzelliği dillere destan Reyyan’ı kavuşabilecek mi?

programme.title: Sıla
programme.desc: Guneydoğuda filizlenen zor bir aşkın oykusu... Kanun tanımaz tore ve toreye karşı gelen bir aşk... Sıla, on uç yaşındayken ailesinden koparılıp, İstanbuldaki çocuksuz bir aileye verilir. Ancak yıllar sonra yuzunu bile hatırlayamadığı ağabeyinin hayatını kurtarmak için berdel olarak, aşiret reisi Boranla evlendirilir. Sıla, artık buyuk bir evde hapiste gibidir.

programme.title: Kertenkele
programme.desc: Zekası ve sıra dışı yetenekleri sayesinde İstanbul polisi tarafından bir turlu ele geçirilemeyen profesyonel hırsız Kertenkelenin Hayatın yalan olsa da aşkın gerçek olsun dedirten hikayesi...Mesleki hayatını takıntılı bir şekilde Kertenkele’yi yakalamaya adayan komiser Ünsal’ın tum çabalarına rağmen Kertenkele izini kaybettirmenin bir yolunu hep bulmuştur.Kertenkele sıfır din bilgisi ile imamlık yapmaya çalışırken karşısına gayrimenkul kralı Ekrem Bey’in guzeller guzeli torunu Zehra çıkar.

programme.title: Çocuklar Duymasın
programme.desc: Farklı karakter yapılarına sahip Meltem ve Haluk çifti, surekli tartışıyor olmalarına rağmen, birbirlerini deli gibi sevmektedir. Başarılı bir kariyere sahip Meltem, evde ailesinin butun ihtiyaçlarına koşturabilme yeteneğine ve enerjisine sahiptir. Tipik bir Anadolu erkeği olan Halukun tek derdi ise yemek, futbol ve tembelliktir. Surekli didişme halinde olan çiftin anlaştığı tek konu ise kızlar ve arabalarla kafayı bozmuş olan oğulları Havuç ve kendini beğenmiş kızları Duygu ile ilgili alınan kararlardır.

programme.title: Bez Bebek
programme.desc: Oyuncaklar ulkesinde yaşayan bez bebek Nana, 100. yaş gununde herkesi şaşırtarak, gerçek bir insan olmayı diler. Nana, insan olup eski sahibi Makbulenin yanına gitmek ister çunku Makbule zor durumdadır. Yakışıklı ve başarılı bir iş adamı olan Hakan’a ve onun iki sevimli çocuğuna bakıcılık yapmakta olan Makbule, ailenin ayrılmaz bir ferdi olmuştur. Hakanla evlenmek isteyen Simgenin tek derdi ise Makbuleyi huzurevine yollamaktır. Bu yuzden tuzaklar kurmaya da başlamıştır.

programme.title: Selena
programme.desc: Selin, Leyla ve Nazlı anne ve babalarını trafik kazasında yitirdikten sonra amcalarının yanına sığınırlar. Ancak onun huysuz karısı Aslı ve Aslının onceki evliliğinden olan kızı Kıvılcım tarafından surekli eziyet gorurler. Kızlar dunyada yapayalnız kaldıklarını zannederler ama aslında dunyanın kaderini değiştirecek ve kotu Hadese karşı savaşacak Selenayı Ütopya gezegeninden çağıracak sırra sahiptirler.

programme.title: Yahşi Cazibe
programme.desc: Cazibe, Azeri asıllı guzel bir kızdır. Turkiyede yaşamak isteyen Cazibenin onundeki tek seçenek, bir Turkle evlenmektir. Karşısına ekonomik sıkıntıları olan Kemal çıkar. Alacağı yuklu para karşısında havalara uçan Kemal, bu evlilik teklifini hiç duşunmeden kabul eder. İkili ilk anda birbirinden hoşlanmaz ancak zamanla bu anlaşmazlık yerini sevgiye ve aşka bırakır. Bu arada şupheci polis komşuları Peker Pekmez onların korkulu ruyası olur.

programme.title: Adanalı
programme.desc: İstanbul’da kapkaç, soygun, kaçakçılık ve dolandırıcılık gibi adi suçlar gunluk hayatın bir parçası olmuştur. İstanbul’u kurtarmak için İzmirde surgunde bulunan Komiser Adanalıyı geri çağırmaktan başka çare kalmaz.Maraz Ali ise İstanbul’un en buyuk suç çetesinin lideridir. Dışarıdan bakıldığında, bir araba yıkama yerinin mutevazi sahibidir. Ama gerçekte, şehirde donen her turlu hırsızlık, kapkaç ve soygun olaylarının buyuk bolumununde onun parmağı vardır. Bugune kadar hiç kimse Maraz Ali’yi içeri tıkabilecek bir ipucu yakalayamamıştır. Bakalım, Adanalı bu konuda ne kadar başarılı olabilecek?

programme.title: Bir Zamanlar Çukurova
programme.desc: Çukurovada aşkın, intikamın, kavganın ve rekabetin oykusu konu ediliyor.

programme.title: Eşkıya Dunyaya Hukumdar Olmaz
programme.desc: Turkiyenin en guçlu ailesi olan Çakırbeylilerin karşısında bu sefer daha zorlu bir sınav vardır: Avrupanın en buyuğu olmak... Bakalım, guç savaşlarında kazanan taraf kim olacak, dunyayı somuren guçler mi, onlara başkaldıran Çakırbeyliler mi?

programme.title: Benim Annem Bir Melek
programme.desc: Neriman, ailesinin uzerine titreyen titiz bir annedir. Ama onun çok buyuk bir zaafı vardır: Kuçuk oğlu Çetin... Çetin’in bir eş ve bir baba olması, Neriman’ın ona, kuçuk bir çocukmuş gibi, ozen gostermesine engel olamamıştır. Çunku ona gore, gelini Ece ne yaparsa yapsın, oğluna kendisi kadar iyi bakamayacaktır. Bu arada buyuk oğlu Metin de yeni bir aşka yelken açmıştır. Sevgilisi Nalan ailesi ile tanışmak isteyince, Çetin ve Metin anneleri Neriman’dan uzak bir tanışma yemeği organize eder. Yemekte sadece Çetin, Metin ve Çetin’in eşi Ece olacaktır. Babaları Cahit de melek anneleri Neriman’ı oyalamakla gorevlidir.

programme.title: Hercai
programme.desc: Midyat’a İstanbullu bir iş adamı olarak gelen Miran Aslanbey, Nasuh Şadoğlu’na ortaklıktan fazlasını teklif eder. Ardından torunu Reyyan’ı da ister. Nasuh, Miran’ı kendi planına ikna etmeye çalışırken, Miran’ın planlarından habersizdir. programme.title: Kırgın Çiçekler
programme.desc: Eylul, Songul, Cemre, Kader ve Meral... Onlar dağılan yuvaların kırgın çiçekleri... Aynı yetimhanede kalan ve aynı okulda okuyan kızlar, yaşadıkları her olayda birbirlerine kenetlenmektedir. Zor zamanlarında onlara Feride ve Toprak oğretmenleri yardım ellerini uzatır.

Ancak yorenin en guçlu aile reisi Nasuh’un çok iyi bir kısmet dediği Miran için farklı planları vardır. Ona bir torun verecektir ama istediği torunu değil... Nasuh, Miran’ı kendi planına ikna etmeye çalışırken, Miran’ın planlarından habersizdir. İki erkek arasında verilecek karar merakla beklenirken, gelen haber Reyyan ve Yaren’in hayatını derinden etkiler.Midyat’ın binlerce yıllık geçmişinin izleri uzerinde yeşeren bir aşk hikayesi, iki ailenin kaderini nasıl etkileyecek? İstanbullu yakışıklı iş adamı ile Midyat’ın guzelliği dillere destan Reyyan’ı kavuşabilecek mi?

programme.title: Sıla
programme.desc: Guneydoğuda filizlenen zor bir aşkın oykusu... Kanun tanımaz tore ve toreye karşı gelen bir aşk... Sıla, on uç yaşındayken ailesinden koparılıp, İstanbuldaki çocuksuz bir aileye verilir. Ancak yıllar sonra yuzunu bile hatırlayamadığı ağabeyinin hayatını kurtarmak için berdel olarak, aşiret reisi Boranla evlendirilir. Sıla, artık buyuk bir evde hapiste gibidir.

programme.title: Gun Başlıyor
programme.desc: Siz de doğruya doğru, eğriye eğri diyorsanız. Gune bizimle başlayın. Guçlunun, kuvvetlinin değil, haklının sozunun geçtiği program Gun Başlıyor Ahmet Özdemir in sunumuyla hafta içi her gun 07:00de Akit TVde.

programme.title: Kırmızı Masa
programme.desc: Objektif bakış, cesur yaklaşım, farklı yorumlarıyla ekranlarınıza gelen Kırmızı Masaya siyaset, sanat, spor, bilim, kultur ve tarih gibi pek çok alanda soz sahibi isim katılıyor.. Tecrubeli gazeteci Muharrem Coşkunun hazırlayıp sunduğu program, geçmiş, bugun ve geleceğe dair net sorularla, dobra dobra cevaplar ışığında ekrana geliyor. Kırmızı Masa Cumartesi 20:00 da canlı yayınla Akit TVde..

programme.title: Rotamız Anadolu
programme.desc: Rotamız Anadolu programı ulkemizin guzelliklerini, kulturunu, tarihini ve zenginliklerini tum doğallığıyla ekranlara taşıyor. Rotamız Anadolu her Pazar 15:30da Akit TVde…

programme.title: Hafta Sonu Ana Haber
programme.desc: Gundemi sarsan olaylar, gun içinde olup bitenler, gundeme damgasını vuran siyasiler ve kişiler,son dakika gelişmeleri,sıcak haberler ve kimsenin dile getiremedikleri Feridun Erdoğral ile Ana Haberde

programme.title: Kayıt Dışı Tarih
programme.desc: Tarihimizi bilmek ve yaşam boyu araştırmak onemli bir gorevdir. İnsanlara doğruyu aktarmak bilgi kadar cesaret de ister. Gerçekle yuzleşmek ve yıkılmadan yola devam etmek gerekir. Bunun için geçmişimizle kucaklaşıp geleceğimizi bu gerçekler ışığında inşa etmeliyiz. Hayatını tarih bilimine adayan Mustafa Armağan sizlere masal değil sadece gerçekleri anlatacak

programme.title: Bir Gece Masalı
programme.desc: Komiser Mahir ile Yoruk kızı Canfezanın Pamukkalenin buyulu atmosferinde başlayıp İstanbulda Asaf Bey konağına uzanan imkansız aşkları konu ediliyor.

programme.title: Ateş Kuşları
programme.desc: Sokak çocuklarının çoğu yirmi yaşını gormez. Gorenlerin de yaşadığı soylenemez. Uyuşturucu, şiddet, cinsel taciz, açlık ve soğuk... Sokak çocuklarının kaderi ya cezaevidir ya da mezar... Bu çocuklardan beş tanesi, bu kadere karşı koymayı başarır. Bu hikaye, kendilerine “Koksuzler” diyen beş sokak çocuğunun, çoplukte kırk gunluk bir bebek bulmalarıyla başlıyor. Ateş kuşları, “Koksuzler”in acı ve zorluklarla orulu kaderlerine karşı dimdik durmaya çalışırken umut dolu bir aileye “Ateş kuşlarına” donuşme oykusudur.

programme.title: Gençliğim Eyvah
programme.desc: Aynı semtin iki duşman kebapçısı Urfalı Bozoğlu ve Adanalı Asmalı ailelerinin etrafında donen aşk, sır ve entrika dolu olaylar konu ediliyor.Gençliğim Eyvah; aşkların, buyuk sırların ve beceriksizce çevirilen entrikaların komedisi...

programme.title: Zembilli
programme.desc: Zembilli kasabası, Muradın askerden izine gelmesiyle bayram yerine doner. Muradın kardeşi Fidan uzun zamandır, gizli saklı, Muradın can dostu Ademe sevdalıdır. Ademden tek isteği abisine ilişkilerini soylemesidir, saklamaktan yorulmuştur. Murad kasabaya donduğunde, sevdalı olduğu Esmaya gorucu geldiğini oğrenir. Gitmeden once soz kesmek ister ama Esmanın babasının bir şartı vardır, Torosların namlı pehlivanı Balabanı yenerse, kızını verecektir. Kasabanın en havalı kızı Gulnura âşık olan, Murad ve Ademin can kardeşi Fırıncı Kadir, aldığı bir mektupla Gulnuru kaçırma planları kurmaya başlar. Harama el uzatmayan, naif kalbi ve kaygılarıyla Muezzin Vahiti de bu plana dahil eder.

programme.title: Aile Saadeti
programme.desc: Konakta bu kez geçmişin golgesi kazılır. Raufun gecenin karanlığında toprağa emanet ettiği bir sır, yıllar sonra yeniden kendini hatırlatır. Bu gizem sadece bahçede değil konaktakiler arasında da yeni bir gerilim yaratır.Gonul, Murattan gelen beklenmedik iltifatlarla şaşkın ama mutludur. Aynı zamanda Murat hayatını toparlarken ona verilen bir pasaport Gonul hakkında yeni soruları da beraberinde getirir. Tulay, konaktaki kahramanlığı ile Altın Maşrapa odulune layık gorulurken Mayanın bu anı sosyal medyada paylaşmasıyla anne kız arasında komik ama gergin bir çatışma başlar.

programme.title: Yok Artık
programme.desc: Taksici Fikret bir sabah her zamanki gibi işe gitmek için evden çıkarken ayağını merdivenlerde burkar. Seke seke taksi durağına, arkadaşlarının yanına gider. Muşteri gelmeden once laflarken muhabbet muhabbeti açar ve Fikret, Almanyada yeni evlenen amca oğlunun komik hikayesinden başlayarak bin bir turlu, yok artık dedirtecek oyku anlatır. Kimisini şoforlere, kimisini muşteriye, bazısını da karısına... Peki, gerçek aslında oyle midir?

programme.title: Vanguard
programme.desc: Tang Huating, Vanguard isimli, uluslararası une sahip olan ileri teknolojili bir guvenlik ajansının kurucusudur. Bir gun iş insanı Qin’in kızı bir grup terorist tarafından kaçırıldığında Vanguard ekibi, genç kızı kurtarmak için harekete geçer. Ancak gorev sırasında işler ters gider ve Qin de teroristlerin eline geçer. Tang sadece muşterisini değil, birçok insanın hayatını kurtarmak için ekibin başına geçer.

programme.title: ATV Ana Haber
programme.desc: Gun içinde yaşanan gelişmeler ve gundemde yer alan konular izleyicilere aktarılıyor. Siyasetten ekonomiye, kulturden sanata Turkiye ve dunya gundemine ilişkin onemli gelişmeler canlı bağlantılarla ekrana geliyor. Program konuklarıyla gundemdeki olayların analizi yapılıyor.

programme.title: Kim Milyoner Olmak İster?
programme.desc: Dunyanın en çok seyredilen ve en çok kazandıran bilgi yarışması Kim Milyoner Olmak İster?, Oktay Kaynarcanın sunumuyla ekrana geliyor. Programa Turkiyenin farklı yerlerinden ya da farklı ulkelerden başvuru yapıp, mulakatla seçilen yarışmacılar katılıyor. Yine moral desteği için yarışmacıların yakınları da studyoda yerlerini alıyorlar. Toplamda on uç soruyu yanıtlamak için yarışmacılara joker hakları sunuluyor. Ayrıca iki baraj hakkı da veriliyor. Baraj sorularına doğru yanıt verildiğinde o ana kadar kazanılan odul, her durumda yarışmacının oluyor. On uç soru doğru yanıtlanırsa kazanılacak odul 5 milyon TL...

programme.title: Aile Saadeti
programme.desc: Konakta bu kez geçmişin golgesi kazılır. Raufun gecenin karanlığında toprağa emanet ettiği bir sır, yıllar sonra yeniden kendini hatırlatır. Bu gizem sadece bahçede değil konaktakiler arasında da yeni bir gerilim yaratır.Gonul, Murattan gelen beklenmedik iltifatlarla şaşkın ama mutludur. programme.title: Kahvaltı Haberleri
programme.desc: Gunun ve bir onceki gecenin en onemli gelişmelerine ve gazetelerden başlıklara yer veriliyor. Ayrıca para piyasaları, kultur ve sanat etkinlikleri ile ilgili haberler de ekrana taşınıyor.

programme.title: Kader Oyunları
programme.desc: Bir tarafta yakışıklı, bilgili ve cesur bir genç olan Demir ile pamuk prenses misali guzel, zengin ama bir o kadar saf ve temiz kalpli Bahar... Diğer tarafta aşklarına turlu planlarla engel olmaya çalışan uvey anne Aysun...

programme.title: Gun Ortası
programme.desc: Turkiyede ve dunyada yaşanan onemli olaylar ekrana taşınıyor. Ayrıca canlı bağlantılara ve uzman goruşlerine de yer veriliyor.

programme.title: Sen Anlat Karadeniz
programme.desc: On altı yaşındayken kapatıldığı evde, sekiz senedir Vedat Sayar’ın karısı olmaya mecbur bırakılan Nefes’in hayatındaki tek guzel şey, oğlu Yiğit’tir. Bu sekiz yıl boyunca gece gunduz gorduğu şiddete boyun eğmeyen Nefes, her fırsatta kaçmaya çalışır. Ancak bu kaçma girişimleri başarısızlıkla sonuçlanır, ta ki Tahir Kaleli ile karşılaşana kadar...Tahir Kaleli, nam-ı diğer Deli Tahir, Karadenizli muhafazakar bir ailenin oğludur. Ailenin sahip olduğu kum şirketinde masa başında oturacağına, kum gemilerinde kaptanlık yapmayı, koca koca direklerin tepelerinde makara yağlamayı tercih eden asi, mert, gozu pek ve korkusuz bir delikanlıdır. Sayar Beton’la anlaşma imzalamak için geldiği İstanbul’da, Tahir’in hayatı sonsuza kadar değişecektir. Vedat Sayar, Kaleli ailesini akşam yemeğine çağırınca Tahir’le Nefes tanışır. Tahir, Nefes’e ilk gorduğu anda vurulur.

programme.title: Çakallarla Dans 5
programme.desc: Çakallarla Dans 5, şartlı tahliye ile salınan çakallar grubunun yasağı delip atıldıkları maceraları konu ediyor. Hâkim karşısına geçen çakallar grubu birbirlerine 100 metre uzak kalma şartıyla tahliye olur. Fakat bu durum ekip için hiç de kolay değildir. Bu sırada Kayınço Gokhan’ın hayatı aldığı haberle bambaşka bir hal alır. Gokhan, yıllar once yaşadığı tek gecelik bir ilişkiden çocuğu olduğunu oğrenir. Üstelik kızı Leyla, zengin ve zuppe bir çocuk olan Sinan ile birliktedir. Gokhan henuz bir kızı olduğuna alışamamışken bir de Sinan’ı oğrenince deliye doner. Boyle bir çocuğun kızı ile olmasını gururuna yediremeyen Gokhan, Sinan’la Leyla’yı ayırmaya karar verir. Bunu tek başına yapamayacağını anlayan Gokhan çakallar grubundan yardım ister.

programme.title: ATV Ana Haber
programme.desc: Gun içinde yaşanan gelişmeler ve gundemde yer alan konular izleyicilere aktarılıyor. Siyasetten ekonomiye, kulturden sanata Turkiye ve dunya gundemine ilişkin onemli gelişmeler canlı bağlantılarla ekrana geliyor. Program konuklarıyla gundemdeki olayların analizi yapılıyor.

programme.title: Aile Saadeti
programme.desc: Gonul ile Murat arasındaki gerginlik artar. Kalmakla gitmek arasında kalan Gonul, kırgınlığını Murata belli eder. Murat ise duygularını bastırmayı tercih eder.Emin, konakta bir define olduğuna inanır. Elinde kazma kurekle bahçeyi kazarken Harun da bu hayale ortak olur. Bir yandan define arayarak çozum bulmaya çalışırken diğer yandan Harun, eski çalışanı Nuriye imzaladığı evraklarla farkında olmadan şirketi devreder. Bu durum Tekinin planlarını doğrudan etkiler. Tekin cephesinde ise işler karışır. Şirkete yatırım yapmak isteyen İngiliz firması adına Ada isminde bir temsilci gelir. Ada, sadece şirket için değil, Tekinle olan geçmişi için de gelmiştir.

programme.title: Guven Bana
programme.desc: Muge Anlının sunduğu Guven Bananın bu haftaki yarışmacı koltuğunda başarılı iki sunucu Asuman Krause ve Alper Ateş yer alacak. Asuman Krause ve Alper Ateş, Guven Bana deyip, bağlılıklarını dile getirecekler. Bu ikili arasında para mı kazanacak yoksa guven mi?

programme.title: Live Aid: When Rock n Roll Took on the World
programme.desc: After seeing a BBC report on Ethiopias "biblical famine," rock star Bob Geldof brings together a group of fellow popstars to record a song that ignites a global movement and raises millions for relief efforts.

programme.title: Live Aid: When Rock n Roll Took on the World
programme.desc: Live Aid _ a same day, joint concert between London and Philadelphia _ becomes the largest global event in history, bringing together a star-studded line up from Tina Turner to Bowie to Queen.

programme.title: Live Aid: When Rock n Roll Took on the World
programme.desc: The second half of Live Aid in the United States brings in millions, thrusting Bob Geldof into Africas politics as he navigates fundraising, controversy and celebrity.

programme.title: DW News
programme.desc: DW News is news and information channel from a German international broadcaster Deutsche Well (German Wall). It provides latest news from Europe and all around the world in several languages on a daily basis. DW news is informative, entertaining, up-to-date and what is more important, reliable source of news.

programme.title: I Dont Want to Be a Mother
programme.desc: Why do some women decide not to become mothers? What role do factors such as wars, environmental destruction, population growth, career or childcare play? What hurdles do these women face in society?

programme.title: In Good Shape
programme.desc: In Good Shape is the weekly health show on DW, covering all aspects of health care: whats new in medical treatment, alternative medicine, wellness and fitness _ as well as nutrition and beauty. In our studio interview we discuss topics in-depth with specialists, and offer you opportunities to pose your own questions.

programme.title: DW News
programme.desc: DW News is news and information channel from a German international broadcaster Deutsche Well (German Wall). It provides latest news from Europe and all around the world in several languages on a daily basis. DW news is informative, entertaining, up-to-date and what is more important, reliable source of news.

programme.title: Reporter: On Location
programme.desc: It is all about dedicated reporters who are at the top table of world affairs and provide on-the-spot commentary from different parts of Germany, Europe and around the globe. On-the-ground reporters are always close to the action, and cover international events or curious facts of daily life.

programme.title: Euromaxx
programme.desc: Weekly lifestyle show on DW presents Europe at its best, starting from culture news to entertainment events, beautiful views of natural scenery and most fascinating modern art pieces. Enjoy Europe in its diversity, its absorbing insights and amazing lifestyle. Explore its best restaurants with most sophisticated cuisine, and extraordinary topics and captivating stories.

programme.title: DW News
programme.desc: DW News is news and information channel from a German international broadcaster Deutsche Well (German Wall). It provides latest news from Europe and all around the world in several languages on a daily basis. DW news is informative, entertaining, up-to-date and what is more important, reliable source of news.

programme.title: Sports Life
programme.desc: Sports Life explores the world of sport, bringing you updates, interviews and reports from across the globe. Sport has the power to break down barriers, improve lives, connect communities, and of course, improve health. The show delves into all aspects of sport, from professionals competing at the very top to everyday individuals simply enjoying a pastime, demonstrating how sport and life are regularly connected.

programme.title: Eastern Germany in Western Hands
programme.desc: Even 35 years after the fall of the Berlin Wall, theres still an imbalance between eastern and western Germany. Many executive positions in the former East are still held by people from the former West Germany. What are the reasons for this?

programme.title: 8:15 Hiroshima - From Father To Daughter
programme.desc: A family is torn apart when the first atomic bomb is dropped in Japan in 1945. A teenaged boy is separated from his father in Hiroshima. Now, decades later, the boys daughter tells the tragic family story.

programme.title: Shift
programme.desc: Can I use blockchain technology? Will artificial intelligence take over my career? What exactly is "Machine Learning"? These are some of the questions "SHIFT – Living in the Digital Age" tries to answer. The program focuses on a single topic – in depth and in detail. We talk to experts, present the key facts and explain complicated subjects in a simple manner. SHIFT – substantial, never superficial.

programme.title: Arts Unveiled: Experiencing and understanding the art world
programme.desc: Arts Unveiled dives deep into the international creative scene, uncovering new ideas and explaining cultural phenomena that shape our history, present and future. Who are the artists? programme.title: The Trade in Human Skulls - A Disturbing Legacy
programme.desc: "African human skull, early 20th century, 2,000 euros." Adverts like this can be seen on social media. The trade is legal in Germany, even when the skulls date from the German colonial era.

programme.title: The 77 Percent
programme.desc: 77 per cent of Africas population are below the age of thirty-five yet their interests are under-represented poltically and economically. This show aims to redress the balance by providing a voice to the largest demographic group on the continent. These dynamic younger people are politically engaged and will determine the future path their countries, and the continent as a whole, will follow in the twenty-first century. Presented by Eddy Micah Jr. and Wanjiku Mwaura.

programme.title: Asia 2050
programme.desc: Tamil Nadu is one of the most urbanized states in India. There was indiscriminate felling of trees in the state to pave the way for development. This increased the heat wildly and the water also dried up. But there are many examples facing Tamil Nadu that can turn the state into a great place by 2050. Find out how, in this documentary.

programme.title: The 77 Percent
programme.desc: 77 per cent of Africas population are below the age of thirty-five yet their interests are under-represented poltically and economically. programme.title: Sport, Sport, Sport
programme.desc: Learning about sports has never been more fun! This exciting animated show teaches us all about different kinds of exercises, physical activity and sports, promoting the benefits of being healthy and encouraging its young viewers to expand their hobbies by exploring new sports. For the littlest viewers, this sport-tastic show promotes motor skills and movement, increasing muscle strength and balance!

programme.title: Sunville
programme.desc: Follow the lives of the animal families of Sunville in these playful silent animated shorts. Encourage your child to join in with the narration of the stories to help them learn new words, identify objects and sounds, and develop their early social skills. Creatively develop your childs imagination as you discover what an average day looks like in their friendly little village.

programme.title: Partners in Fun
programme.desc: Go on countless adventures and mess around with this adorable duo. Join a baby monkey and bear-cub as they play around, making friends and having fun. Young viewers can develop their social skills and learn about the value of friendship whilst experiencing lots of different adventures. Get your little one to interact with the show by identifying colours as they come onto the screen for extra learning.

programme.title: City Life
programme.desc: Learn all about everyday life in the city. Come along as we meet the places, vehicles, people and animals that we find in our city. Walking around and talking to your child about what you are seeing is the best way for them to learn, but City Life is a great introduction for learning about different everyday places, developing social skills, and introducing toddlers to basic objects.

programme.title: Puffy and Tubby
programme.desc: Join best friends Puffy and Tubby, a couple of guinea pigs who are always hungry, as they embark on journeys around their environment in the search for more and more food. With a focus on developing social skills, identifying new objects and introducing your little ones to various new adventures, Puffy and Tubby excels at combining developmental lessons with endless fun.

programme.title: Vege-tales
programme.desc: In Veggie-tales, childrens animated series, talking fruit and vegetable perform theatrical productions based on very kind stories. Main characters Bob the Tomato and Larry the Cucumber with the help of other vegetables are telling stories and teaching kids the basic human values, like honesty, thankfulness, kindness.

programme.title: Groups
programme.desc: This adorable fox will help your little ones to learn how to categorise objects. This show is enhanced with sufficient interaction with the children that its aimed at, for example the learning of older children is enhanced by asking them questions such as "whats different" between two or more objects. For younger children it is more beneficial to just point out these differences or similarities.

programme.title: Oli - The Cycles of Nature
programme.desc: Give your child a head start, in a way thats fun and exciting, too. Oli the elephant will teach your child to identify objects and their uses in everyday life, develop their thinking and observational skills, and also he will promote an interest in nature. This is a Duck TV production, designed to aid the development of young children.

programme.title: Enchanting Sights
programme.desc: Colourful moving geometric shapes, which should enable your child to learn the names of basic shapes. The shapes spin and spiral around the television screen. This enchanting display is accompanied by soothing music. This programme is not only designed to help children in learning the names of shapes, but it allows them to experience colours and music, too, nurturing your childs imagination.

programme.title: Colorwheel
programme.desc: One brave little pup is determined to find his friend, who is lost in the forest. He uses his trusty colour wheel to navigate his way, using skills of reasoning and logic. This programme is a Duck TV production, that intends to educate its audience, alongside entertaining them. In this series, children will develop skills such as problem solving, decision making, and also knowledge around colour.

programme.title: Whats Your Job?
programme.desc: "Whats Your Job" introduces younger audiences to various professions in society and combines education with enjoyment. When watching this series, parents are advised to talk about the jobs that are being shown so that they are able to learn why people do the profession that they do. Encouraging education and fun, this show introduces children to new words that they can learn but in a creative way.

programme.title: In the Museum
programme.desc: In a big museum full of beautiful art something peculiar keeps happening. Every now and then an animal disappears from the paintings. Can you help Mr.Clown as he journeys around the museum in search of his missing friends? In a great introduction to different types of art, In the Museum helps to reinforce shape recognition and improve young viewers ability to recognise and identify different animals.

programme.title: Listen to This
programme.desc: This fun and colourful cartoon will keep your kids entertained, and also teach them a couple of creative skills on the way, through encouraging young children to pair sounds to animals and musical instruments. The programme will introduce key musical instruments, and improve sound recognition. This is a Duck TV production, designed to aid child development.

programme.title: Color Magic
programme.desc: Watch as happy smiley blobs of paint in red, green, blue and yellow, dance across the screen, colouring in the outlined picture as they go, transforming dull and lifeless pictures into colourful and vibrant masterpieces. Let your imagination run wild with this simple but fun colouring show whilst also developing your basic visual skills, stimulating colour and shape recognition and identification.

programme.title: Space Adventures
programme.desc: In this childrens cartoon that focuses on animals and other imagined creatures travelling through space, children are encouraged to think creatively, and widen their vocabulary. programme.title: Sunville

programme.desc: When viewing this cartoon, your child will watch various vehicles, which will, in turn, make them aware of a variety of different shapes and objects in the real world. programme.title: The World of Animals
programme.desc: This childrens cartoon is both educational and entertaining. Children will develop their knowledge on animals, so that they cannot only name animals, but they have a basic understanding of how and where they might live. programme.desc: Come and join the dance party! Get up and get moving with these three adorable characters as they dance around the screen to different songs and tunes. programme.title: Raul
programme.desc: Raul and Birdie are best friends. Raul is an adorable green hippopotamus who loves to go on exciting adventures and Birdie is his side kick. These two lovable characters find themselves in all sort of situations as they journey around the countryside, but with each others help they will always find their way out of any problem.

programme.title: Doll Team to the Rescue
programme.desc: Bell and her trusty friends Fido the Kangaroo and Lilo the Bear come to the rescue in the forest for anybody that needs it! Doll Team to the Rescue teaches the importance of social skills, friendship and treating animals with love and respect.

programme.title: Train
programme.desc: Join the friendly train conductor and adorable cartoon train as they go on magical journeys and gentle adventures, making sure all of their passengers get taken to the right place at the right time. The short stories are designed to teach your little ones about grouping and categories, using colour, shape, size and purpose to demonstrate this logical task.

programme.title: Leon-ART
programme.desc: Join the painter bear as he draws and paints friends for himself to play with. What are his painted friends today? The series is a perfect bedtime story to relax before going to bed. The bear helps to encourage imagination and develop basic visual and motor skills. A whole family can paint together for the perfect bonding activity of parents and children.

programme.title: Fireteam in Action
programme.desc: Fireteam in Action on Duck TV is an animated series revolving around great adventures of firemen. Kids find out about their significant work and learn the importance of helping each other in difficult situations. The series and its sweet characters teach the little viewers to give a helping hand and be responsible.

programme.title: Leon-ART
programme.desc: Join the painter bear as he draws and paints friends for himself to play with. What are his painted friends today? The series is a perfect bedtime story to relax before going to bed. programme.title: Mimo and Bobo
programme.desc: Mimo, the cute little panda bear and his loyal friend Bobo, encourage you to describe and narrate what you see. Encourage your little ones and ask them questions about their journey through each episode.

programme.title: Sunville
programme.desc: Follow the lives of the animal families of Sunville in these playful silent animated shorts. Encourage your child to join in with the narration of the stories to help them learn new words, identify objects and sounds, and develop their early social skills. Creatively develop your childs imagination as you discover what an average day looks like in their friendly little village.

programme.title: Waterworld
programme.desc: Learn how important water is to life on earth. This informative animation is something adults and children can enjoy together, while learning about animal habits and their habitats. Making the world of water come to life, help your child recognise and name animals to increase cognitive processes and strengthen memory. Submerge yourself in a world of fish and dont miss out.

programme.title: Elf World
programme.desc: Two elves join together to explore Dreamworld, and they want you to come along, too! As with many of the Duck TV productions, there is also an educational purpose to this bright and engaging cartoon. This will enhance your childs creativity and encourage them to think creatively, while keeping them entertained throughout.

programme.title: Galaxy Tourists
programme.desc: Galaxy Tourists is out of this world. In classic Duck TV style this show stimulates the senses of its young audience and encourages creating thinking and imagination.

programme.title: Ducky and Friends
programme.desc: Childrens programme that follows the amazing adventures of a lovable little duck named Ducky, and a variety of her friends. programme.desc: Join the little yellow duckling and her big elephant friend as they have endless fun splashing around in the Bathroom. programme.title: City Life
programme.desc: Learn all about everyday life in the city. Come along as we meet the places, vehicles, people and animals that we find in our city. Walking around and talking to your child about what you are seeing is the best way for them to learn, but City Life is a great introduction for learning about different everyday places, developing social skills, and introducing toddlers to basic objects.

programme.title: Vege-tales
programme.desc: In Veggie-tales, childrens animated series, talking fruit and vegetable perform theatrical productions based on very kind stories. Main characters Bob the Tomato and Larry the Cucumber with the help of other vegetables are telling stories and teaching kids the basic human values, like honesty, thankfulness, kindness.

programme.title: Africa
programme.desc: Go on a journey through the continent of Africa and meet all of the native animals as they roam around having fun and playing games in their natural environment. Africa introduces its young viewers to a wider range of animals, including some lesser known ones that they probably havent heard of before, a great way for children to develop their cognitive and observational skills.

programme.title: Hubbi Will Take Care of It
programme.desc: Hubbi hippo, Matti beaver and Milo and the ultimate DIY trio, no task is too great for this ferocious three. They are determined to fix everything, helping everyone they meet along the way. No job is too big for this group of friends. This cartoon is not only incredibly entertaining, but it promotes problem-solving, and encourages observational and cognitive skills within young children.

programme.title: DuckSchool
programme.desc: In a forest kindergarden, woodland animals who call it their home are learning the basics of English from their helpful fairy teacher, Miss Sunshine. Play along with the twins and encourage your child to listen and identify the sounds you hear together. Can you work out the source before the twins do?

programme.title: Albert Explains
programme.desc: Professor Albert uses his incredible knowledge to demonstrate the use of everyday objects, in this Duck TV production. Duck TV aims to produce content thats both entertaining and informative, so that children may learn new skills in a fun and creative way. In this particular skills, the Professor helps children develop their cognotive skills, so that they can grow up to be as clever as him.

programme.title: The Shapies
programme.desc: The protagonists of The Shapies introduce us to the world of shapes through their adventures. They show us where they fit in, what things they resemble, how they transform if they are together and how they make up entire stories.

programme.title: Color Clara
programme.desc: Clara is an extraordinary, extra colourful, chameleon girl. Deep in the jungle in her cosy chameleon house, Clara uses her colour changing powers for good by helping her wrongly coloured jungles friends and objects to return to their natural colour. This exciting jungle tale helps young viewers to connect objects to their usual colours, developing their basic visual skills..

programme.title: Dotty, the Kitty
programme.desc: Get creative with Dotty the Kitty and follow the dotted line left by the pencil to try and create a masterpiece. Uncover the final painting and unlock the imagination of your child all at the same time. Dotty the Kitty helps kids to develop their shape recognition, hand-eye coordination and their ability to associate objects with their realistic shapes and colours!

programme.title: Happy Meadow
programme.desc: Two happy rabbits, Sari and Nati have lots of fun playing in Happy Meadow, in this childrens cartoon. They have plenty of other lovable friends who also live in Happy Meadow with them. Duck TV aim to produce content for young children that is educating, and aids their development, while being entertaining at the same time. Children are encouraged to grow their vocabulary and recognise colours.

programme.title: Home Sweet Home
programme.desc: As is the case with many Duck TV programmes, this programme is designed to both educate and entertain its young audience. This cartoon takes a look into the lives of a range of the cutest baby animals, and explores their family relationships. The cartoon develops social skills and understanding family relationships, alongside improving the ability to recognise different animals, too.

programme.title: Little Melodies
programme.desc: This show encourages creativity, as you learn lots of fun new songs. This skill can be extended to everyday life; sing these songs at bedtime, in the car, on a walk, whenever! This sharpens the sense of hearing and nurtures any musical skills, aiding child development. This is a Duck TV production. Duck TV aim to produce content that is both educational and entertaining.

programme.title: Tempo Giusto
programme.desc: Learning about time can be hard, but Tempo Giusto makes it so much fun. Go on an adventure with Henry and Lola as they introduce you to the basics concepts of time, help you develop your pre-math skills and teach you about the sequencing of events. Lola uses her love of numbers to tell the time whilst Henry uses his amazing storytelling skills to show us what kids get up to at different times of the day.

programme.title: Lola and the Numbers
programme.desc: Lola and the Numbers makes counting fun for its littlest viewers. Lola is a playful young girl who helps us to identify different numbers, count from one to ten and develop our pre-math skills. The most important viewing tips for parents and little ones is that we always count with Lola! whether its in English or your own language, counting aling is always fun!

programme.title: Risto Gusto
programme.desc: Basil, Yam and Oregano have their own restaurant and are always happy to treat their little friends to healthy food and drinks. Its fun for everyone to have a good meal, walk around the park and explore the world around them. Th cartoon stimulates childrens imagination and creativity, and it also has got tranquil sweet tunes that follow every adventure.

programme.title: DuckSchool
programme.desc: In a forest kindergarden, woodland animals who call it their home are learning the basics of English from their helpful fairy teacher, Miss Sunshine. Learn some brand new words and practice your counting skills, or listen carefully to the stories Miss Sunshine has to tell. With Duckschool we can learn about so many things! There might even be some special guests to meet along the way.

programme.title: Henrys Stories
programme.desc: Henry loves telling stories, but he needs your help to make sure its all in the correct order. Follow Henry in these silent animated shorts as he constructs stories with the help of his handy picture cards. Teach your children about logical thinking and deductive reasoning as you narrate the sequences together and solve his picture puzzles to see the story come to life.

programme.title: Higher the Better
programme.desc: Come along with Kiteko the goofy giraffe and Umi the playful meerkat in Higher the Better as they watch the everyday life of toddlers and begin to learn about their everyday adventures! Travelling on field trips and making lots of fun when theyre playing, Higher the Better develops childrens social skills, encourages them to observe and think deeper about what they are watching on their screen.

programme.title: Hubbi and Friends
programme.desc: Hubbi and Friends are a group of handymen that embark on a series of exciting adventures on their travels through the countryside. They use their passion for fixing to fix everything that they find, even if it doesnt need fixing. The show teaches the incredibly important lesson that its okay to make mistakes, which promotes healthy interactions between parents and children.

Encourage your little ones to play pretend, cooking up some imaginary treats for you, your friends and family. Learn some new vocabulary, stimulate your senses and having fun.

Learn about the different everyday objects and colours while introducing your children to new multi-sensory activities.

programme.title: Mimos World
programme.desc: Join some of our favourite Duck TV characters as they embark on lots of new adventures. Our little panda bear Mimo and his best friend Bobo from "Didy Baby" and "Mimo and Bobo" journey around Mimos world meeting new friends and having fun. This exciting new show puts a massive emphasis on the importance of friendship and teaches us all about different friendship values.

programme.title: Planet Jumpers
programme.desc: Planet Jumpers is a series set in the future, in space. Through the everyday life of the siblings Luna and Lou we get to know different planets, funky futuristic objects and places while developing the socialization skills of our preschooler viewers.

programme.title: Ducky and Friends
programme.desc: Childrens programme that follows the amazing adventures of a lovable little duck named Ducky, and a variety of her friends. By watching their escapades, young viewers will have lots of fun, and they will also have a chance to learn about friendship, sharing, and playing nicely with friends.

programme.title: Connected World
programme.desc: Join the children in this friendly multicultural day-care centre and learn about the diverse heritages of each of the toddlers. Learn where each of the pupils are from and even try to guess their nationalities from their clothing, favourite landmarks and special foods. Help them to narrate the stories and encourage them to be curious about new cultures, languages and countries.

programme.title: Hubbi Will Take Care of It
programme.desc: Hubbi hippo, Matti beaver and Milo and the ultimate DIY trio, no task is too great for this ferocious three. They are determined to fix everything, helping everyone they meet along the way. No job is too big for this group of friends. This cartoon is not only incredibly entertaining, but it promotes problem-solving, and encourages observational and cognitive skills within young children.

programme.title: Ristorante
programme.desc: Welcome to the Ristorante, come in and find out how the restaurant works. Learn about all the different processes starting with the preparation and moving to the baking or the cooking, the serving and finally to the dish washing. Encourage your little ones to play pretend, cooking up some imaginary treats for you, your friends and family. Learn some new vocabulary, stimulate your senses and having fun.

programme.title: Animals
programme.desc: An educational show which teaches children everything they need to know about all sorts of animals, ranging from a familiar domestic cat or even the wildest of tigers found in the deepest of wildernesses. The programme explores how each and every one of these animals behaves, eats and plays and compares those characteristics to those us humans adopt.

programme.title: Sea Adventure
programme.desc: Gentle animation set to music. Sea Adventure follows the lives of two lively little fish who are growing up in their natural environment. This show can be used to help teach toddlers new vocabulary.

programme.title: Safari
programme.desc: Children can learn about the various wild and not-so wild animals from this well beautifully illustrated safari related programme. It goes on to explore each animals habitats within the environment it lives in but also studies their behaviour. This will provide children with a real insight into animals they already know and some that they may not and include facts that are not always provided.

programme.title: Mini Fairy Tales

programme.title: Mimo and Bobo

programme.title: City Life

programme.title: Dotty, the Kitty
programme.desc: Get creative with Dotty the Kitty and follow the dotted line left by the pencil to try and create a masterpiece. Uncover the final painting and unlock the imagination of your child all at the same time. Dotty the Kitty helps kids to develop their shape recognition, hand-eye coordination and their ability to associate objects with their realistic shapes and colours!

programme.title: Little Melodies
programme.desc: This show encourages creativity, as you learn lots of fun new songs. This skill can be extended to everyday life; sing these songs at bedtime, in the car, on a walk, whenever! programme.title: The Shapies

programme.title: DuckSchool
programme.desc: In a forest kindergarden, woodland animals who call it their home are learning the basics of English from their helpful fairy teacher, Miss Sunshine. Learn some brand new words and practice your counting skills, or listen carefully to the stories Miss Sunshine has to tell. With Duckschool we can learn about so many things! There might even be some special guests to meet along the way.

programme.title: Groups
programme.desc: This adorable fox will help your little ones to learn how to categorise objects. This show is enhanced with sufficient interaction with the children that its aimed at, for example the learning of older children is enhanced by asking them questions such as "whats different" between two or more objects. For younger children it is more beneficial to just point out these differences or similarities.

programme.title: Puffy and Tubby
programme.desc: Join best friends Puffy and Tubby, a couple of guinea pigs who are always hungry, as they embark on journeys around their environment in the search for more and more food. With a focus on developing social skills, identifying new objects and introducing your little ones to various new adventures, Puffy and Tubby excels at combining developmental lessons with endless fun.

programme.title: Safari
programme.desc: Children can learn about the various wild and not-so wild animals from this well beautifully illustrated safari related programme. It goes on to explore each animals habitats within the environment it lives in but also studies their behaviour. This will provide children with a real insight into animals they already know and some that they may not and include facts that are not always provided.

programme.title: Color Magic
programme.desc: Watch as happy smiley blobs of paint in red, green, blue and yellow, dance across the screen, colouring in the outlined picture as they go, transforming dull and lifeless pictures into colourful and vibrant masterpieces. programme.title: Enchanting Sights
programme.desc: Colourful moving geometric shapes, which should enable your child to learn the names of basic shapes. The shapes spin and spiral around the television screen. programme.title: Get Up!
programme.desc: We should not just sit in front of the TV! Lets stand up and move. Langi, Rundi and Rendi exercise, imitating the movements of Nature. Lets keep up with them to improve our coordination and strengthen our health.

programme.title: Mini Fairy Tales
programme.desc: Join the princess, the dragon, the fairies and the elves on their adventures in this mini-series of all your favourite fairy-tales. Designed with education and creativity, Mini Fairy Tales ensures to bring your childs imagination to life, encouraging parents to get involved and participate in telling stories your young ones! Come on an adventure and join in with the fairy-tale!

programme.title: Dance
programme.desc: Come and join the dance party! Get up and get moving with these three adorable characters as they dance around the screen to different songs and tunes. Dance is an excellent way to develop young viewers musical skills, the sense of rhythm and even their listening skills, setting them up for a bright future. And lets be honest, everyone loves to have a good dance.

programme.title: The Way We Travel
programme.desc: When viewing this cartoon, your child will watch various vehicles, which will, in turn, make them aware of a variety of different shapes and objects in the real world. programme.title: Beaver Family
programme.desc: This cartoon is designed for very young children. It shows the relationships of a beaver family, and how they go about their everyday lives. This programme has educational benefits, as long as serving to keep young children entertained. This programme is designed to enhance social skills, and develop child-parent relationships, too. It also promotes interaction between parent and baby.

programme.desc: Learning about sports has never been more fun! programme.desc: One brave little pup is determined to find his friend, who is lost in the forest. He uses his trusty colour wheel to navigate his way, using skills of reasoning and logic. programme.desc: Learn how important water is to life on earth. This informative animation is something adults and children can enjoy together, while learning about animal habits and their habitats. programme.desc: Learn all about everyday life in the city. Come along as we meet the places, vehicles, people and animals that we find in our city. programme.title: Leon-ART
programme.desc: Join the painter bear as he draws and paints friends for himself to play with. What are his painted friends today? The series is a perfect bedtime story to relax before going to bed. The bear helps to encourage imagination and develop basic visual and motor skills. A whole family can paint together for the perfect bonding activity of parents and children.

programme.title: Hubbi Will Take Care of It
programme.desc: Hubbi hippo, Matti beaver and Milo and the ultimate DIY trio, no task is too great for this ferocious three. They are determined to fix everything, helping everyone they meet along the way. No job is too big for this group of friends. This cartoon is not only incredibly entertaining, but it promotes problem-solving, and encourages observational and cognitive skills within young children.

programme.title: Didy Baby
programme.desc: Go on an adventure with a group of adorable baby animals in Didy Baby. The show teaches its tiny viewers social skills, and introduces them to problem solving and decision making.

programme.title: Mimo and Bobo
programme.desc: Mimo, the cute little panda bear and his loyal friend Bobo, encourage you to describe and narrate what you see. They also put a focus on seasons and the weather, helping its little viewers learn about rain and sunshine, in a fun and exciting way.

programme.title: Hipp-hopp Cactus
programme.desc: Join three houseplants and a busy little bee as they learn more about the objects, shapes and colours they find around their home. Once theyre sure no one is around, the trio of plants come to life and identify where to find them and how to use them properly. Learn up to 20 new words a day as your child has fun labelling the objects they see while searching for them in your own home.

programme.title: Cucu, Im here!
programme.desc: Have some fun with the Cucus as they play hide and seek. Cucu, Im here! follows the cucus as they go on lots of adventures, playing games and laughing all day! What better way to improve young viewers cognitive skills, introducing them to object permanence and developing their thinking skills. Cucu, Im here! is the perfect way to have some fun whilst learning something new.

programme.title: Henrys Stories
programme.desc: Henry loves telling stories, but he needs your help to make sure its all in the correct order. Follow Henry in these silent animated shorts as he constructs stories with the help of his handy picture cards. Teach your children about logical thinking and deductive reasoning as you narrate the sequences together and solve his picture puzzles to see the story come to life.

programme.title: Ristorante
programme.desc: Welcome to the Ristorante, come in and find out how the restaurant works. Learn about all the different processes starting with the preparation and moving to the baking or the cooking, the serving and finally to the dish washing. Encourage your little ones to play pretend, cooking up some imaginary treats for you, your friends and family. Learn some new vocabulary, stimulate your senses and having fun.

programme.title: Risto Gusto
programme.desc: Basil, Yam and Oregano have their own restaurant and are always happy to treat their little friends to healthy food and drinks. Its fun for everyone to have a good meal, walk around the park and explore the world around them. Th cartoon stimulates childrens imagination and creativity, and it also has got tranquil sweet tunes that follow every adventure.

programme.title: Sippi Sappi
programme.desc: Sippi Sappi is an educational show about a couple of friends who love rollerskating around whilst on holiday in the countryside. The programme aims to encourage its young viewers to engage in sporting activites, encourage creative thinking and relate to other childrens adventures. Aired on Duck TV Sippi Sappi is an all round fun way to get your little ones active and excited about sport.

programme.title: Toby McFly
programme.desc: This imaginative and creative childrens animation follows the adventures of Toby McFly, a canine aviator who presents us with a birds eye view of the world. After flying over many fascinating landscapes, active animals, busy people, and interesting places, Toby lands his aircraft and shows us, in detail, what we have just seen from above. The show is educational, stimulating, and informative as well as being fun and entertaining.

programme.title: Zack and Ziggy
programme.desc: Meet a little geek boy named Zack and his best friend, a dog named Ziggy as they help children learn the concept of size through funny adventures, laughter and games. Join them as they make size based line ups, groups, and comparisons, having lots of fun along the way.

programme.title: Color Clara
programme.desc: Clara is an extraordinary, extra colourful, chameleon girl. Deep in the jungle in her cosy chameleon house, Clara uses her colour changing powers for good by helping her wrongly coloured jungles friends and objects to return to their natural colour. This exciting jungle tale helps young viewers to connect objects to their usual colours, developing their basic visual skills..

Encourage your little ones and ask them questions about their journey through each episode.

programme.desc: Monica and Rudy is a colorful animated series on Duck TV intended for the youngest viewers. Monica is a little girl who has a pet- a parrot named Rudy. Monica takes Rudy out of the cage and together they go on their little adventures- in the forest, in the park, or to the pond where they meet different animals and birds. Monica teaches Rudy to imitate the sounds made by the animals.

programme.title: Finn and Fianna
programme.desc: Finn and Fianna, the two little elves, are studying their environment and discovering their environment with a lot of curiousity! Getting to know their surroundings and the basic attributes that exist within it, join Finn and Fianna as they use their senses of seeing, tasting, feeling and discovering to develop your little ones thinking skills as well as what they see!

programme.title: Get Up!
programme.desc: We should not just sit in front of the TV! Lets stand up and move. Langi, Rundi and Rendi exercise, imitating the movements of Nature. Lets keep up with them to improve our coordination and strengthen our health.

programme.title: Sippi Sappi
programme.desc: Sippi Sappi is an educational show about a couple of friends who love rollerskating around whilst on holiday in the countryside. The programme aims to encourage its young viewers to engage in sporting activites, encourage creative thinking and relate to other childrens adventures. Aired on Duck TV Sippi Sappi is an all round fun way to get your little ones active and excited about sport.

programme.title: Albert Explains
programme.desc: Professor Albert uses his incredible knowledge to demonstrate the use of everyday objects, in this Duck TV production. Duck TV aims to produce content thats both entertaining and informative, so that children may learn new skills in a fun and creative way. In this particular skills, the Professor helps children develop their cognotive skills, so that they can grow up to be as clever as him.

programme.title: Henrys Stories
programme.desc: Henry loves telling stories, but he needs your help to make sure its all in the correct order. Follow Henry in these silent animated shorts as he constructs stories with the help of his handy picture cards. Teach your children about logical thinking and deductive reasoning as you narrate the sequences together and solve his picture puzzles to see the story come to life.

programme.title: Cucu, Im here!

What better way to improve young viewers cognitive skills, introducing them to object permanence and developing their thinking skills. Cucu, Im here! is the perfect way to have some fun whilst learning something new.

programme.title: Hop-hop

programme.title: Margo and Felix
programme.desc: Living and playing in a beautiful house is so much fun, but Margo and Felix also have to be responsible in order to look after the house. Join these two best friend for creative thinking and lots of games!

programme.title: Hubbi and Friends
programme.desc: Hubbi and Friends are a group of handymen that embark on a series of exciting adventures on their travels through the countryside. They use their passion for fixing to fix everything that they find, even if it doesnt need fixing. The show teaches the incredibly important lesson that its okay to make mistakes, which promotes healthy interactions between parents and children.

programme.title: Mimo and Bobo PLUS
programme.desc: Join the two familiar characters who have become preschoolers but still love fun adventures which teach them about various useful things. In their amazing adventures, Mimo and Bobo learn about friendship, sharing, helping others and more, helping children develop their social and observational skills.

programme.title: Zack and Ziggy
programme.desc: Meet a little geek boy named Zack and his best friend, a dog named Ziggy as they help children learn the concept of size through funny adventures, laughter and games. Join them as they make size based line ups, groups, and comparisons, having lots of fun along the way.

programme.title: Raul
programme.desc: Raul and Birdie are best friends. Raul is an adorable green hippopotamus who loves to go on exciting adventures and Birdie is his side kick. These two lovable characters find themselves in all sort of situations as they journey around the countryside, but with each others help they will always find their way out of any problem.

programme.title: Africa
programme.desc: Go on a journey through the continent of Africa and meet all of the native animals as they roam around having fun and playing games in their natural environment. Africa introduces its young viewers to a wider range of animals, including some lesser known ones that they probably havent heard of before, a great way for children to develop their cognitive and observational skills.

programme.title: Ducky and Friends
programme.desc: Childrens programme that follows the amazing adventures of a lovable little duck named Ducky, and a variety of her friends. programme.title: Cubie
programme.desc: Animated childrens series following Cubie the builder who has fantastic plans for new buildings. Cubie loves to build and, with help from his friends, the cheerful cubes, erects inventive new constructions. This enjoyable series from Duck TV helps children build their spatial awareness and observational skills while learning about new prepositions and the basics of building.

programme.title: Hipp-hopp Cactus
programme.desc: Join three houseplants and a busy little bee as they learn more about the objects, shapes and colours they find around their home. Once theyre sure no one is around, the trio of plants come to life and identify where to find them and how to use them properly. Learn up to 20 new words a day as your child has fun labelling the objects they see while searching for them in your own home.

programme.title: Sunville - Sportsville
programme.desc: Mister Goat, the Raccoon Family, Kitty Cat and the Friendly Pig are participating in Sports Day, and they want you to come along and join the fun! In doing so, not only will your child have lots of fun, but they will be exercising and developing basic coordination skills along the way. They will also increase muscle strength and sense of balance, which will keep them healthy and happy!

programme.title: Sounds Around Us
programme.desc: Join elf twins Liza and Ben to learn more about sounds, how to find them and how to recreate them. Follow them as they whizz away on exciting adventures together to investigate where different familiar sounds are coming from. Play along with the twins and encourage your child to listen and identify the sounds you hear together. Can you work out the source before the twins do?

programme.title: Nature Dudes
programme.desc: Nature Dudes is a fun cartoon that helps its young viewers to learn about all things natural. They focus on teaching about identifying different animals, learning about their different habits and habitats. They also put a focus on seasons and the weather, helping its little viewers learn about rain and sunshine, in a fun and exciting way.

programme.title: Happy Garden
programme.desc: Come into the Happy Garden where fruits, vegetables and plants will dance to entertain you! Happy Garden was designed to aid the development of younger audiences, learning about the world around them,.

programme.title: Tempo Giusto
programme.desc: Learning about time can be hard, but Tempo Giusto makes it so much fun. Go on an adventure with Henry and Lola as they introduce you to the basics concepts of time, help you develop your pre-math skills and teach you about the sequencing of events. Lola uses her love of numbers to tell the time whilst Henry uses his amazing storytelling skills to show us what kids get up to at different times of the day.

programme.title: Fireteam
programme.desc: Hop on board the bright red fire truck and follow the three little firemen as they get to work keeping their village safe. These silent animated shorts are perfect for educating your child on the importance of safety and the role of the emergency services. Encourage your child to develop their ability to problem solve and improve their decision-making skills by identifying hazards and solutions together.

programme.title: Fireteam

programme.title: Sounds Around Us
programme.desc: Join elf twins Liza and Ben to learn more about sounds, how to find them and how to recreate them. programme.desc: Learning about time can be hard, but Tempo Giusto makes it so much fun. Go on an adventure with Henry and Lola as they introduce you to the basics concepts of time, help you develop your pre-math skills and teach you about the sequencing of events. Lola uses her love of numbers to tell the time whilst Henry uses his amazing storytelling skills to show us what kids get up to at different times of the day.
